features: ★【ARCHED FRAME DESIGN】The top of the mirror uses a arched top frame design. Ultra-thin frame, the entire glass mirror is not surrounded by the frame, it is independent of the frame, making the entire mirror look very unique and upscale. It is very conspicuous in any space and makes your room look very tasteful.

★【FULL SIZE MIRROR】65”x22” mirror full length the large floor mirror help you to see your full body. When open the U-shape bracket and placed the mirror on the ground, support will be formed between the bracket and the mirror, it is very stable, the mirror can stand freely anywhere.

★【GLASS & MIRROR】Floor length mirror made of high-definition, copper-free silver mirror. anti-rust treatment, no oxidize and rust. Our mirrors are explosion-proof materials (not cheap substitutes). When an accident occurs, the mirror glass will not be scattered around, ensuring your safety!

★【MULTIFUNCTIONAL】Full length mirror can be tilted to the wall or stand anywhere with brackets, and it can also be installed on the wall vertically. The hook on the back is suitable for almost all places indoors or outdoors.
★【After-Sales Service】OGCAU not only provide warranties but also commit to comprehensive after-sales service, ensuring your shopping experience is pleasant.
body.description: OGCAU Full Length Dressing Mirror Full Body Size Desingh: The top of our full-length mirror is designed with an arched top frame, which is made of polystyrene. The entire glass mirror is not surrounded by the frame, it is independent of the frame. Size: 65”x22”. The large floor mirror help you to see your full body. When open the H-shape bracket, a triangular support will be formed between the bracket and the mirror, it is very stable. Glass: High-definition. Copper-free silver mirror, anti-rust treatment, no oxidation and no rust. Our mirrors are explosion-proof materials. You can be safe in the event of an accident! Multifunctional: The full-length mirror can be tilted to the wall or stand anywhere with brackets, and it can also be installed on the wall vertically.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Shape: archedColor: black, gold, whiteAdvantages: easy to moveMaterial: polystyrene, silver, glassInstallation method: vertical or suspendedApplication space: living room, bedroom, bathroom, hotel OGCAU Full Length Dressing Mirror Full Body Size Desingh: The top of our full-length mirror is designed with an arched top frame, which is made of polystyrene. The entire glass mirror is not surrounded by the frame, it is independent of the frame. Size: 65”x22”. The large floor mirror help you to see your full body. When open the H-shape bracket, a triangular support will be formed between the bracket and the mirror, it is very stable. Glass: High-definition. Copper-free silver mirror, anti-rust treatment, no oxidation and no rust. Our mirrors are explosion-proof materials. You can be safe in the event of an accident! Multifunctional: The full-length mirror can be tilted to the wall or stand anywhere with brackets, and it can also be installed on the wall vertically.

3 Ways to Use Free Standing The mirror can be placed on the floor, and the supporting hinge on the back has enough stability, you can easily store it or put it wherever you like. Hanging It can be hung on the wall as a decorative mirror. You can install it on a suitable wall according to your preference. Leaning Aginst the Wall You can remove the bracket of the mirror and lean it against the wall as a full-length mirror or decoration.

EXQUISITE WORKMANSHIP We use high-quality polystyrene and authentic silver glass. The arched appearance adds beauty to this full-length mirror. Our mirrors are silver-backed, and can reflect beautiful natural and artificial light no matter whether it is day or night.

PERFECT DECORATION The classic multifunctional design can be used in the bedroom, living room and as a wall mirror decoration. When you put them in a good place, it will instantly enhance the beauty of any room in your home!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I gave this to my teenager last year for Xmas! It was delivered undamaged and ease to install. We pulled it out of the package and she wanted it to lean against her wall. The size and color is perfect! I’m now wanting one for my walk-in closet!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good quality and looks great leaning against the wall

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great for our workout room. Sturdy and easily puts together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect style for our hallway.Simple, but works out for us.This mirror will look lovely with any style in your home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price for fancy mirror!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this. I’ve been looking for a large mirror for a while and this was so well priced! It’s really pretty and sturdy. You can either attach to the wall or have it lean on it. I wanted to leave it leaning on the wall so I was pretty happy with how sturdy it is. The mirror doesn’t distort the images and it’s super easy to clean. It’s a bit heavy so not one to be moving around all the time. If you are looking for a fancy-looking oversized mirror but don’t want to spend over 500 on it, this one is for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not look like the pictures
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't look as good as the pictures. The product is wrapped with cheap materials. This thing looks like it was used. It had really hard gross dirty spots, like what you see from a dirty bathroom mirror. The mirror itself looks nice especially after I had to Scrub off whatever was on it. But the frame is poorly made. It's like they tried to laminate the wood instead of painting it. You can clearly see where the seems meet and it looks almost like it was dragged around a lot. There's a lot of wear along the edges. Either it was a used product or it was poorly manufactured. If I could return It I would but it doesn't seem to have the option to do so. I wouldn't gamble on this mirror.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well built and looks like a designer item for much less
reviews.reviewText: What can I say, it’s a mirror. But it is well built, sturdy, heavy. I could see this being sold at a high end furniture store for 3-5x the cost on Amazon. Worth it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with this mirror, I was worried it may have a warped reflection or be super thin, but it is very sturdy and the reflection is great. My only complaint is with the color of the gold frame, its not as subtle as I would like for it to be, but its still a good mirror.
